about_the_game:
In Mythic Victory Arena, you start the game being able to start with 1 of 3 characters to be your champion. Completing the game up to certain parts will unlock more characters to start the game with, but with this DLC you will be able to start as any character that you'd like to start with.

Take advantage of this DLC if you don't want to spend time in game to unlock each character.
